name: To The Top (itch) (weweplayero)
description:
There is only one objective: reach the top before your opponent!

This is a 1 vs 1 local game in which you can choose between multiple camera modes to play: fixed, follow top player, adaptative or split screen.

Assets used:

Player sprites: https://dani-maccari.itch.io/player-animations-tim

Platforms sprites: https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines

Music: https://youtu.be/UX8Jg1GwFYM

Sounds generated with: https://sfxr.me/
